mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_log (user_id, phone, user_name, status, token, token_expire_time, date, ip, version, device_id, platform, channel ) VALUES (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE login_log SET user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token_expire_time = #{tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, phone, user_name, status, token, token_expire_time, date, ip, version, device_id, platform, channel FROM login_log WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT id, user_id, phone, user_name, status, token, token_expire_time, date, ip, version, device_id, platform, channel FROM login_log
